name: FatNS Analyzes and Tests Name Servers

screenshots.caption: Two attack detectors loaded, viewing a glued record suspect
While capturing, with no attack detectors loaded

short_description: FatNS Analyzes and Tests Name Servers. It is a PCAP-based security tool intended to sniff and detect common attacks on the DNS system, and is designed to be easily expandable with additional attack detectors.
